Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Clinton
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Clinton. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Clinton.
 
At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.
 
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
